main.name: CherryTree Co.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to drop me a line.

resume.skillmessage: Proficiency levels of the following skillsets:

highlights: Need a site to advertise your business? Want to sell products online? Need a portal to enhance your customer relationships and give your employees flexibility and convenience? Perhaps you want a blog, or a place to exhibit some photos or the new songs you wrote? Maybe you want a new front-end hooked into your back-end data?

Perhaps you need some custom data objects created to facilitate a workflow process or you may need some data migrated or integrated across your platforms? Need a report, or a tweak to that existing one? Get some cool analytics, reports and charts on your dashboards? Maybe it is taking far too long for that batch process to complete each evening?

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
